attacks.name: Effortless Slash
attacks.special: Each Crit allows one more D6 to be rolled.

attacks.name: Go for the Throat
attacks.special: This Attack’s Power is not boosted by any Equipment. If HP is removed by this Attack, may re-roll any failed Enthral attempts against the target this Round.

traits.name: Feed
traits.description:
Vampires feast upon the life essence of their prey, be it blood or the substance of their souls. Sometimes their hunger can overwhelm them, particularly when they feel weakened. A Vampire may feed upon a friendly Thrall in base contact for an Easy Feat and regain D6 HP. The Thrall loses the same amount of HP.

If a Vampire is at 25% or less of their starting HP, they must attempt to Feed if there is a Thrall within 6”. If not in base contact with an enemy, they must use their full movement towards the nearest Thrall.
